text: This is a list of the seventy-seven counties in the U.S. state of Oklahoma. Oklahoma is ranked 20th size and 17th in the number of counties. ==Alphabetical list== County FIPS Code County Seat Created Origin Meaning of name Oklahoma Historical Society.
